name: Swamp Pets
description:
This is game submitted for 'So  bad it's good' game jam.  Assets from the unity asset store or other online stores have been used, but are all under public license or licenses were I can use it but not redistribute the assets itself. As the title suggests, it has bad audio setting for various assets, bad rigging for the turtles and the space outside the play area is clearly unfinished.

You are a swamp animal expert who capture iguanas and turtles for the local pet store. Use the targeting system(red square) to lock onto the creature and click to capture then. Turtle earn you $10 while iguanas earn you $30. Turtles are so slow and easy to catch while iguana are not. Try to get a maximum score in 2 mins. Press ESC while playing to return to the main menu. Press ESC on this screen to quit the game.
